ET Sniper enhances your phone-based customer interactions by providing one-click Email and Text communications and instant connection to a client-controlled content platform. With ET Sniper, you can create an unlimited repository of prebuilt email and text messages, organized within campaigns and accessible to your entire organization. Powerful personalization features, including User Entered Data and Auto Field Capture, offer limitless ways  to expand your communication beyond basic static messaging to include proposals, orders, confirmations and more.

What Can It Do For You?

Give agents instant access to predefined Email and Text messages to quickly and easily communicate with prospects regardless of the system they are in.

Use Text 'response requested' messages for missed calls and reminders and get instant notification of responses.

Send professional, credible messages to increase the success of callbacks and follow ups.

Let prospects "see" what you are telling them with instant access to content that you both view and controlled by agent.

Where Does It Work?
Any webpage or web-based application run within Chrome. This can include CRMs, Dialer Pages, and Goggle sheets.  And, with any page you can take advantage of our easy-to-use one-time page mapping to incorporate Data Capture with your essage.  

OfferPad Feature:
This is an Instant Presentation Platform within ET Sniper that allows you to create "Offers", consisting of a collection of content (images, video, rich text documents) ordered and arranged in sections you define. Selecting "default" content items represent your starting Offer which can be sent with one-click by Email or Text to your prospect.  While connected Agents have access and view to all the content associated with the offer and can add, replace, and remove content that displays for the prospect. The OfferPad is easily hosted on your domain providing additional credibility and upon completion of your negotiations, the revised Offer can be saved and include an expiration period for the prospects continued access. 

New Click2Dial Feature!:
We have added a no cost add-on extension called ET Sniper Click2Dial! This companion extension works in conjunction with your ET Sniper account and provides companies click-to-dial functionality from any web page or web-based app.  Please see our Chrome Store listing for complete details.

Please see https://etsniper.com for a complete list of the features available within ET Sniper.
